name: Kuby
description:
Our entry into the 2022 Kenney Game Jam! The theme was GROWTH! So, we made a virtual pet gelatinous cube named Kuby! Adopt one today!

Controls:

  • Mouse - Drag and drop items for your Kuby to eat!
  • The REFRESH button is there to replenish your items after they're gone.
    • Or just to cycle through new items.

Features:

  • Feed your Kuby
    • Kuby has his likes and dislikes, see if you can find them.
  • Watch him digest food (It's actually just junk we found lying around in the dungeons back rooms...)
  • That's about it for now...

Credits:

  • Assets: Kenney.nl
  • Idea: Adam, Magnus, Nate, Robert
  • Itch.io Assets: Magnus
  • Audio: Adam
  • Programming and Asset Manipulation: Nate
  • Transportation: Robert
